summary: The Financial Technology Protection Act of 2025 aims to combat terrorism and illicit financing through financial technology. It establishes an Independent Financial Technology Working Group composed of government representatives and industry experts. The Working Group will research the use of digital assets and emerging technologies in illicit activities and develop legislative and regulatory proposals. The bill also mandates a report and strategy from the President on mitigating the illicit use of these technologies, including their use by foreign actors to evade sanctions and threaten national security.
